groups.name: gateway.fallback
groups.description: Custom fallback messages for API Gateway circuit breaker endpoints.

properties.name: gateway.fallback.user.message
properties.description: Message returned when user-microservice is unavailable.
properties.defaultValue: User service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

properties.name: gateway.fallback.enrollment.message
properties.description: Message returned when enrollment-microservice is unavailable.
properties.defaultValue: Enrollment service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

properties.name: gateway.fallback.course.message
properties.description: Message returned when course-microservice is unavailable.
properties.defaultValue: Course service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

values.value: User API is overloaded, please retry later.
Enrollment API is overloaded, please retry later.
Course API is overloaded, please retry later.
